original_text: and burned his burnt offering and his grain offering and poured his drink offering and threw the blood of his peace offerings on the altar.
korean_text: 자기의 번제물과 소제물을 불사르고 또 전제물을 붓고 수은제 짐승의 피를 제단에 뿌리고

sentences.original_text: and burned his burnt offering and his grain offering
and threw the blood of his peace offerings on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 제단 위에 그의 화목제물의 피를 뿌렸다
